title: Author Meet & Greet: Romantic Tales
description: Join us for an intimate evening with bestselling author. Sign books and take photos.

title: Monthly Book Club Discussion
description: This month we're discussing contemporary fiction. New members welcome!

title: Young Readers Workshop
description: Interactive workshop for ages 8-12. Learn creative writing techniques with our guest instructor.

title: Holiday Book Signing
description: Multiple authors signing copies of their latest releases. Perfect for holiday gifts!

title: Poetry Evening & Open Mic
description: Share your poetry or listen to local poets. Refreshments provided. RSVP required.

title: Mystery Book Series Launch
description: Celebrate the launch of an exciting new mystery series. Exclusive pre-order deals available.
